body:
When I play, I use left-arrow and key-arrow on my keyboard to move through different stages of the game. My options are set so that no step is skipped automatically.
If I open the Card Explorer, or the Preferences option, when I go back to the game the keys don't work anymore, and I have to use the mouse to click on the arrow. 
I am using version 1.19 on Linux Ubuntu 10.04. I play through Wine.
Not a big issue, but worth notifying.
Thanks!
author: [efranc...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/103507307054111542324/)
title: Preferences and Card Explorer disable arrow keyboard control
